Context: The LLC Laptop Loan Policy had changes on December 18, 2023. The library locations offer individual study carrels and group study tables on a first-come-first-serve basis. Casa Loma, St. James, and Waterfront LLCs have silent study areas as well. No disruptive noise is permitted. There is a phone number for inquiries: 416-415-2000 and a TTY number: 1-877-515-5559. The email address for inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. There is also a Social Media Hub to visit. The information on the website is subject to change without notice, and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
